name: Multi-Persona Combat Robots Arena
description:
Game made for Ludum Dare #35, theme: Shapeshift.

It's a multiplayer game, so invite your friends to play with you! Or drop me a line on Twitter at @kalkatos. I will join you if I happen to be having a break at work.

Instructions:

Right click: move
Left click: attack
Buttons 1, 2 and 3: change aspect of character.

Squary guy drops a box on the enemies.
Sphery guy rolls over enemies.
Spiky girl spins a saw at enemies.
